javadoc: Launcher entry point for running headless Ghidra.

methods.name: launch
methods.comment:
The entry point of 'analyzeHeadless.bat'. Parses the command line arguments to the script
 and takes the appropriate headless actions.

params.name: args
params.comment: Detailed list of arguments is in 'analyzeHeadlessREADME.html'

methods.name: parseOptions
methods.comment: Parses the command line arguments and uses them to set the headless options.

params.name: args
params.comment: The command line arguments to parse.

params.name: startIndex
params.comment: The index into the args array of where to start parsing.

params.name: ghidraURL
params.comment: The ghidra server url to connect to, or null if not using a url.

params.name: filesToImport
params.comment: A list to put files to import into.

throws.comment:
if an error occurred parsing the arguments or setting
         the options.

methods.name: usage
methods.comment:
Prints out the usage details and exits the Java application with an exit code that
 indicates error.

params.name: execCmd
params.comment: the command used to run the headless analyzer from the calling method.

name: AnalyzeHeadless
comment: Launcher entry point for running headless Ghidra.
